text:
Here are the lyrics to **"Umbrella"** by Rihanna (featuring Jay-Z):

---

**[Intro: Rihanna]**
(Yeah, yeah)
(No, no, no)
(Yeah, yeah)
(No, no, no)

**[Verse 1: Rihanna]**
You have my heart
And we'll never be worlds apart
Maybe in magazines
But you'll still be my star

Baby, 'cause in the dark
You can see my glow
And, baby, with the lights out
It's like a disco

So dance with me
Underneath the umbrella
Underneath the umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh

**[Chorus: Rihanna]**
Under my umbrella
Under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh
Under my umbrella
Under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh

**[Verse 2: Rihanna]**
Sunshines, we'll share them
I've got enough for two
And when it rains, we'll be okay
No clouds in our sky

Baby, we'll be fine
Even if the world is ending
You are my best friend
Stick with me 'til the end

**[Chorus: Rihanna]**
Under my umbrella
Under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh
Under my umbrella
Under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh

**[Bridge: Rihanna]**
You can stand under my umbrella
You can stand under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh
Under my umbrella
Under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh

**[Verse 3: Jay-Z]**
No clouds in my stones
Let it rain, I hydroplane in the bank
Comin' down with the Dow Jones
When the clouds come, we gone
We Roc-A-Fella
We fly higher than weather, man
You know me, in anticipation for precipitation
Stack cheddar, man
Forecastin' the weather, man

**[Chorus: Rihanna]**
Under my umbrella
Under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh
Under my umbrella
Under my umbrella
Ella, ella, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh, eh

**[Outro: Rihanna]**
It's raining, raining
Ooh, baby, it's raining, raining
Ooh, baby, come into me
Come into me
It's raining, raining
Ooh, baby, it's raining, raining
You can always come into me
Come into me

---
